FAST (This can attack and use abilities as if it started in the battlezone under your control the turn it entered play.) UPGRADE (Reveal this from your hand, sacrifice a card that shares a type with this card = Deploy this faceup.)
Enter - If you deployed this using Upgrade, you may being combat.

card.name: Devouring Hedonist
card.text:
UPGRADE (Reveal this from your hand, sacrifice a card that shares a type with this card = Deploy this faceup.)
Enter - If you deployed this using UPGRADE, draw a card.

card.name: Ornate Egg
card.text:
This cannot attack or block.
When this is trashed as part of an UPGRADE cost, return it to the battlezone with a hatched counter on it.
While there is a hatched counter on this it loses all other rules text.

card.name: Drama Droid
card.text:
While this is in your hand, if you deployed an event this turn, this has FREE.
While your Mastermind is undepleted, this gets +1/+1.
When you deploy an event, this gets +1/+1 and gains ELITE this turn.

card.name: Special Ops Mime
card.text:
COST: There is no trap check for this.
CRITICAL (This card's party causes rep to be destroyed when it inflicts combat damage to a mastermind.)
Attack - Skip this combat's trap check.
{T} your Mastermind, sacrifice this = Pick a mortal or trap and destroy it.

card.name: Clown-cycle
card.text:
When a mortal enters the battlezone under your control, add a power counter to this.
Remove 3 power counters from this = This turn, your mortals gain +2/+2

card.name: War Memorial
card.text:
When you lose rep, add that number of respect counters to this.
Remove 3 respect counters from this = This card's owner gains this as a rep. You may deploy a mortal. (When you gain a rep, shuffle them.)

card.name: Amnesia Flower
card.text:
When you discard a card, add a bud counter to this for each discarded card.
Remove 3 bud counters from this = Each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Fake News
card.text:
COST: {T} your Mastermind.
For each opponent, that player depletes all but one of their mortals.

card.name: Proof of Stake
card.text:
COST: Choose any number of options once. Sacrifice a resource for each option chosen beyond the first.
- Draw 2 cards. - Pick a mortal and deplete it. - One of your mortals gains ELITE this turn. - Pick a depleted mortal and inflict 2 damage to it.

card.name: Proof of Pudding
card.text:
COST: Choose any number of options once. Sacrifice a resource for each option chosen boyind the first.
- Discard up to 2 cards. Draw that many cards. - One of your mortals gains FAST this turn. - One of your mortals gains MOMENTUM this turn. - Undeplete one of your mortals and begin combat. Only that mortal may attack during that combat.

card.name: Proof of Personhood
card.text:
COST: Choose any number of options once. Sacrifice a resource for each option chosen byond the first.
- You may mulligan up to 2 cards. - Each player sacrifices one of their mortals. - Pick an item and destroy it. - Search your deck for a standard resource and put it onto the battlezone.

card.name: Proof of Work
card.text:
COST: Choose any number of options once. Sacrifice a resource for each option chosen beyond the first.
- Destroy an opponent's facedowen resource. - One of your mortals gains DISTRACT this turn. - SORT 4 - Gain a rep.

card.name: Proof of Proof
card.text:
COST: Choose any number of options once. Sacrifice a resource for each option chosen beyond the first.
- Pick a mortal with 3 or more power and destroy it. - Search your deck for an event, reveal it and put it on top of your deck. - Put a mortal from your trashpile into your hand. - Up to 2 of your mortals gain ELITE this turn. Sacrifice them at the end of the turn.

card.name: Pure Energy
card.text:
COST: Sacrifice up to 2 resources.
For each resource trashed this turn (including facedown resources that are no longer resources), create a Supergy, a 4/4 [G] Superbeing mortal token.
2[G] 2[A] - UTILIZE (Reveal this while it's a facedown resource, {D} = Deploy this ignoring its influence requirement.)

card.name: Delta Spidgel
card.text: At the start of your turn, add up to 1 power counter to this and trigger the effect equal to the number of power counters on this: 1 - One of your mortals gets +2/+2 this turn. 2 - One of your mortals gets -2/-2 this turn. 4 - One of your mortals gets +5/+5 this turn and when it attacks this turn, skip that combat's trap check. Remove all power counters from this.

card.name: Epsilon Spidgel
card.text: At the start of your turn, add up to 1 power counter to this and trigger the effect equal to the number of power counters on this: 2 - Draw a card. Discard a card. 3 - Your opponents draw a card. 4 - Inflict 3 damage to each mortal and remove all power counters from this.

card.name: Pi Spidgel
card.text: At the start of your turn, add up to 1 power counter to this and trigger the effect equal to the number of power counters on this: 1 - Deplete an opponent's mortal. 2 - Deplete one of your mortals. 3 - One of your mortals gains Unblodckable this turn and remove all power counters from this.

card.name: Theta Spidgel
card.text: At the start of your turn, add up to 1 power counter to this and trigger the effect equal to the number of power counters on this: 2 - Each opponent discards a card. 3 - Void a card from your hand. 4 - Put a mortal from a trashpile onto the battlezone under your control and remove all power counters from this.

card.name: Gamma Spidgel
card.text: At the start of your turn, add up to 1 power counter to this and trigger the effect equal to the number of power counters on this: 1 - Mulligan up to 2 cards. 2 - Your opponents mulligan up to 3 cards. 4 - Search your deck for a card, put it 2nd from the top and remove all power counters from this.

card.name: Surreal Eel
card.text: Discard a card = This gets +3/-3 this turn.

card.name: Murderous Expeditor
card.text: Sacrifice a mortal = Look at the top 2 cards of your deck, you may put one onto the battlezone as a face down resource and the other on top of your deck. This gains UNBLOCKABLE this turn.

card.name: Trendsetter
card.text:
Blocks - You may put a glamour counter on this.
While this has 3 or more glamour counters on it, it gains ELITE. (While all mortals in this mortal's party have ELITE, the party cannot be blocked except by mortals with ELITE.)

card.name: Void Bringer
card.text:
Enter - Put a mortal from any player's trashpile into the void.
When this would leave the battlezone, instead put it on the bottom of its owner's deck and put the mortal voided by this onto the battlezone under your control.

card.name: One-Bear Band
card.text:
LUFE (All mortals able to block this must do so.)
Enter, Attack or Leave - Pick an opponent's mortal and deplete it.

card.name: Delta Host
card.text: DISTRACT (When this attacks, you may pick a mortal. If you do, that mortal cannot block this combat.)

card.name: Epsilon Host
card.text: ELITE (While all mortals in this mortal's party have ELITE, the party cannot be blocked except by mortals with ELITE.)

card.name: Pi Host
card.text: FAST (This can attack and use abilities as if it started in the battlezone under your control the turn it entered play.)

card.name: Theta Host
card.text: Trashed - Each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Gamma Host
card.text: Attack - At the end of combat, undeplete this.

card.name: Experimental Implant
card.text:
Alter Mortal
Attached mortal gets +2/+2 and gains "When this would be trashed, put it onto the battlezone under its owner's control as a facedown resource instead."
(An alter is attached to the named card type when it enters the battlezone. If the attached card leaves the battlezone, the alter is trashed.)

card.name: High-Concept Body Mod
card.text:
Alter Mortal
Attached mortal gets +1/+0 and gains "Hit - Pick a depleted mortal and inflict 2 damage _to_ it."
(An alter is attached to the named card type when it enters the battlezone. If the attached card leaves the battlezone, the alter is trashed.)

card.name: Hatchet Hands
card.text:
Alter Mortal

card.name: Appendage of Agony

Alter Mortal

Alter Mortal

card.name: Secret Insignia
card.text:
Alter Mortal
Attached mortal gains "{T} = This turn, PROVIDES - One of any influence."

card.name: Muscle Manatee
card.text: Once per turn, Discard a standard [G] resource = This gets +4/+4 this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Conspicuous Pet
card.text:
Once per turn, Discard a standard [E] resource This gains ELITE this turn. Draw a card.
(While all mortals in this mortal's party have ELITE, the party cannot be blocked except by mortals with ELITE.)

card.name: Unlicensed Whappy Impersonator
card.text: Once per turn, Discard a standard [P] resource = This gains FAST this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Synchronaut
card.text: Once per turn, Discard a standard [T] resource = This turn, when this hits a Mastermind, that Mastermind's controller discards a card. Draw a card.

card.name: Sleeper Agent
card.text: Once per turn, Discard a standard [D] resource = This turn, when this hits a Mastermind, gain a rep. Draw a card.

card.name: Basic Mastermind
card.text:
Enter - Search your deck for a standard resource and put it onto the battlezone. Gain 2 rep.
{D} = Draw a card, deploy a card, or begin combat.
{T} = Draw a card or begin combat.

card.name: Moth Collector
card.text: Attack - All mortals with life 3 or less that can block, must block this.

card.name: Human Cannonball
card.text: Sacrifice a mortal. If you do, pick an opponent's mortal and destroy it.

card.name: Ryyl Assassin
card.text:
{T} your Mastermind, sacrifice this = An opponent absorbs a rep.
3[P] - {T} your Mastermind, sacrifice this = Pick an opponent's mortal and destroy it.

card.name: Swollen Symbiote
card.text:
Attached mortal gets +1/+1 and gains "Hit - At the end of this combat, you may deploy an event."
(Gear can be attached to your mortal when it enters the battlezone or when your mortal enters the battlezone if the gear is unattached. You may use a {D} to attach the gear to any of your mortals.)

card.name: Bull In A China Shop
card.text: Pick an opponent's item and put it onto the battlezone under its owner's control as a facedown resource. If you do, you may discard 2 cards. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Relentless Saboteur
card.text:
Free (Reveal this from your hand = Deploy this faceup.) COST: There is no trap check for this. Put one of your resources into its owner's hand.
HIT - You may sacrifice this. If you do, destroy an opponent's facedown resource.

card.name: Shadow Operative
card.text: 4[D] - When this would be destroyed, any player may sacrifice a mortal. If they don't put this into its owner's hand instead.

card.name: Bagman
card.text:
Enter - Search your deck for a standard resource and put it into your hand.
Trashed - You may put an opponent's resource from their trashpile into the battlezone under your control.

card.name: Cosmic Wink
card.text:
COST: Sacrifice a facedown resource.
Destroy all mortals and items with 3 or less influence requirement.

card.name: Priest of Vol
card.text: This mortal's power and life are each equal to your [a] influence. ([a] influence is provided by facedown resources.)

card.name: Ed Dibblewealth
card.text:
Enter - Search your deck for a standard [T] resource and put it onto the battlezone. Gain 3 rep.
{D} = Draw a card, deploy a card, or begin combat.
{T} = Deploy an event or item.

card.name: Walter Robinswood
card.text:
Enter - Search your deck for a standard [G] resource and put it onto the battlezone. Gain 3 rep.
{D} = Draw a card, deploy a card, or begin combat.
{T} = Deploy a standard resource.

card.text:

{D} = Draw a card, deploy a card, or begin combat.
{T} = Deploy a facedown resource.

card.name: Vartuum
card.text:
Enter - Search your deck for a standard [P] resource and put it onto the battlezone. Gain 3 rep.
{D} = Draw a card, deploy a card, or begin combat.
{T} = Begin combat. You may only attack with 1 or fewer mortals this combat.

card.name: Shamblin Shroombeast
card.text:
ELITE (While all mortals in this mortal's party have ELITE, the party cannot be blocked except by mortals with ELITE.) POWERFUL (This card's party causes 2 rep to be absorbed when it inflicts combat damage to a mastermind. If the mastermind only had 1 rep, exile the mastermind.)
Trashed - Create a Micro-muh-Shroom, a 1/1 [T] Abomination Fungus mortal token.

card.name: Master Flatsassin
card.text:
ELITE (While all mortals in this mortal's party have ELITE, the party cannot be blocked except by mortals with ELITE.) POWERFUL (This card's party causes 2 rep to be absorbed when it inflicts combat damage to a mastermind. If the mastermind only had 1 rep, exile the mastermind.)
Trashed - You may pick a depleted mortal, inflict 1 damage to it.

card.name: Ghatak Piercer
card.text:
POWERFUL (This card's party causes 2 rep to be absorbed when it inflicts combat damage to a mastermind. If the mastermind only had 1 rep, exile the mastermind.)
Attack - Sort 1. You may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a mortal card, you may destroy a mortal with the same total influence requirement. (Look at the top X cards of your deck, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Gassie Goon
card.text:
POWERFUL (This card's party causes 2 rep to be absorbed when it inflicts combat damage to a mastermind. If the mastermind only had 1 rep, exile the mastermind.)
Attack - You may discard a card, if you do draw a card. If the discarded card is a standard [P] resource, skip this combat's trap check.

card.name: Holy Holy Hippo
card.text:
POWERFUL (This card's party causes 2 rep to be absorbed when it inflicts combat damage to a mastermind. If the mastermind only had 1 rep, exile the mastermind.)
While this is depleted, your opponents cannot deploy resources unless they are standard or facedown.

card.name: Corporate Raider
card.text:
ELITE (While all mortals in this mortal's party have ELITE, the party cannot be blocked except by mortals with ELITE.)
Hit - You may put a standard [E] resource from your hand onto the battlezone. You may pick a depleted mortal, inflict damage to it equal to your [E] influence.

card.name: Terminal Recollection
card.text: Reveal your deck, hand and trashpile then void all cards with the same name as this card. Until the end of this turn, if a card would go to your trashpile, instead void it. You may deploy up to 3 events and/or items from your trashpile.
